title: Increase of locked error per second for site: {{site.name}}
description: Notifies when IIS not locked error per second are higher than usual for a specific site.

definition.message: An increase of locked errors per second for site: {{site.name}}  has been detected over the last 15mins. Typically reported as an HTTP 423 response code.
definition.name: [IIS] Increase of locked error per second for site: {{site.name}}
definition.query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:iis.errors.locked{*} by {site}, 'agile', 2, direction='above', alert_window='last_15m', interval=60, count_default_zero='true', seasonality='daily') >= 1
